body.p: Kentucky farmer and soldier. Lived in Grayson County, Kentucky in 1860. Served as 1st sergeant in the 17th Kentucky Infantry (Co. F) from January 1862 to January 1863. Served as 2nd lieutenant in the 17th Kentucky Infantry (Co. D) from January 1863 to October 1863. Served as 1st lieutenant in the 17th Kentucky Infantry (Co. A) from November 1863 to May 1864. Served as captain in the 17th Kentucky Infantry (Co. B) from May 1864 to January 1865.

bibl.p: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), 940-941, 944-945, 952-953, 964-965; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, p. 76.
